name: Insurance Planner
description: A complete insurance management Google Sheet designed to help you stay on top of all your policies—for yourself and your family. Whether it’s health, life, vehicle, or accidental insurance, this planner ensures you never miss a due date and always know your coverage details.

sections.title: All Policies, One View
sections.text: Add every policy you hold into a structured table with essential columns like provider, premium, due date, insured person, and category. You’ll never lose track of what matters most.
sections.htmlText: Add every policy you hold into a structured table with essential columns like provider, premium, due date, insured person, and category. You’ll never lose track of what matters most.

sections.title: Smart Dashboard Overview
sections.text: Get a high-level view of your total coverage, upcoming premiums, overdue policies, and due reminders. The dashboard gives you a pulse on your insurance health instantly.
sections.htmlText: Get a high-level view of your total coverage, upcoming premiums, overdue policies, and due reminders. The dashboard gives you a pulse on your insurance health instantly.

sections.title: Stay Ahead With Complete View
sections.text: Visualize your premium due dates in a composite format. Easily spot what’s cost analysis and avoid last-minute surprises or missed payments.
sections.htmlText: Visualize your premium due dates in a calendar format. Easily spot what’s coming up next week or month and avoid last-minute surprises or missed payments.

sections.title: Family-Wise Policy Tracking
sections.text: Assign policies to each family member and monitor coverage per individual. A great way to ensure no one in your family is left unprotected or under-insured.
sections.htmlText: Assign policies to each family member and monitor coverage per individual. A great way to ensure no one in your family is left unprotected or under-insured.

sections.title: Premium History & Payment Log
sections.text: Log past premium payments to stay audit-ready and maintain financial discipline. View trends in your insurance costs and adjust coverage as needed.
